member.name: T:VRDR.Faker.DeathRecordFaker
member.summary: Class Faker can be used to generate synthetic DeathRecords. Various options are available to tailoring the records generated to specific use case by the class.

member.name: F:VRDR.Faker.DeathRecordFaker.state
member.summary: State to use when generating records.

member.name: F:VRDR.Faker.DeathRecordFaker.type
member.summary: Type of Cause of Death; Natural or Injury.

member.name: M:VRDR.Faker.DeathRecordFaker.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor with optional arguments to customize the records generated.

member.name: M:VRDR.Faker.DeathRecordFaker.Generate(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Return a new record populated with fake data.
